control

Class StatisticsInit

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.StatisticsInit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    peersim.core.Control

    public class StatisticsInit
extends java.lang.Object
implements peersim.core.Control
    Class that implements the initializer that performs some statistics on the already created overlay network.
    Since:
    March 9, 2015
    Author:
    Giuseppe Miraglia

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String dataSetName 
      private int linkablePID 
      private static int MAX_DISTANCE

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StatisticsInit(java.lang.String prefix)
      Constructor method.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void analizesFPeersDegree()
      Writes, on the statistics file, the degree (number of neighbors) of each FPeer of the overlay network.
      private void analizesFPeersLocalCC()
      Computes and writes, on a statistic file, the local cluster coefficient (CC) for each FPeer of the overlay network having at least two neighbors, using the following formula:

      Let's G=(V,E) the undirected overlay network.
      boolean execute()
      Performs some statistics on the already parsed and created overlay network, as specified in the configuration file, including:
      1) the degree of each FPeer of the overlay network;
      2) the local clustering coefficient of each FPeer of the overlay network;
      3) the diameter of the overlay network;
      4) the average path length of the overlay network.
      private void findAvgShortestPathLength()
      In order to find the average shortest path length, the method:

      1) computes all the shortest paths between each pair of nodes of the overlay, using Floyd-Warshall algorithm;
      2) then sums all the lengths of these shortest paths and divides the obtained value by the number of undirected edges between the nodes of the overlay and writes it on the configuration file.
      private void findDiameter()
      In order to find the longest shortest path (so the overlay network diameter), the method:

      1) computes all the shortest paths between each pair of nodes of the overlay, using Floyd-Warshall algorithm;
      2) finds the overlay's diameter as maximum length between all the shortest paths and writes it on the configuration file.
      private int[][] FloydWarshall(int networkSize)
      Floyd–Warshall algorithm for the computation of the length of all-shortest paths between each pair of FPeers of the overlay network in O(|V|^3).

        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • analizesFPeersLocalCC

        private void analizesFPeersLocalCC()
        Computes and writes, on a statistic file, the local cluster coefficient (CC) for each FPeer of the overlay network having at least two neighbors, using the following formula:

        Let's G=(V,E) the undirected overlay network.
        For each v in V with |N(v)| >= 2 , CC(v) = |Eind(v)| / |N(v)| * (|N(v)| - 1)
        where Eind(v) = {(j,k) in E | j,k in N(v)}

      • analizesFPeersDegree

        private void analizesFPeersDegree()
        Writes, on the statistics file, the degree (number of neighbors) of each FPeer of the overlay network.

      • FloydWarshall

        private int[][] FloydWarshall(int networkSize)
        Floyd–Warshall algorithm for the computation of the length of all-shortest paths between each pair of FPeers of the overlay network in O(|V|^3). Algorithm from Wikipedia.
        Parameters:
        networkSize - the size of the overlay network on which computes all the shortest paths

      • findDiameter

        private void findDiameter()
        In order to find the longest shortest path (so the overlay network diameter), the method:

        1) computes all the shortest paths between each pair of nodes of the overlay, using Floyd-Warshall algorithm;
        2) finds the overlay's diameter as maximum length between all the shortest paths and writes it on the configuration file.

      • findAvgShortestPathLength

        private void findAvgShortestPathLength()
        In order to find the average shortest path length, the method:

        1) computes all the shortest paths between each pair of nodes of the overlay, using Floyd-Warshall algorithm;
        2) then sums all the lengths of these shortest paths and divides the obtained value by the number of undirected edges between the nodes of the overlay and writes it on the configuration file.

      • execute

        public boolean execute()
        Performs some statistics on the already parsed and created overlay network, as specified in the configuration file, including:
        1) the degree of each FPeer of the overlay network;
        2) the local clustering coefficient of each FPeer of the overlay network;
        3) the diameter of the overlay network;
        4) the average path length of the overlay network.
        All the computed informations are written on a statistics file.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface peersim.core.Control
        Returns:
        always false.
